name: Chaos Weekly
description:
Chaos Weekly is a game where you, as a magazine editor, trying to get money by making covers and headlines. Make the world chaotic with the power of hoax for raking in the cash, but going overboard will get you in trouble!

Credits

Christopher Fendika Lee - Team Manager and Programmer
Audrey Levina - Programmer
Jeffryco Ardiya - Game Designer
Nayra Jannatri - 2D Artist
Dheanandri - 2D Artist
Willie Soo - Sound Artist
